THREAD DATA 1 â€“ Pre-Timeline Summary Extract

This document includes all relevant project planning, backend setup, dev alignment, technical troubleshooting, and high-level strategy threads that occurred prior to the formal timeline milestone "Full IntelliCV Development Timeline (High Level)".

Key Activities Prior to Timeline Setup:

1. ğŸ“¦ Infrastructure & Environment
   - Virtual environments setup: venv / env310
   - Python version migrations: 3.13 â†’ 3.10 due to SpaCy and NumPy compatibility
   - `requirements.txt` restructuring: multiple versions reconciled into `requirements_cleaned.txt`
   - Pip issues and dependency conflicts resolved (notably `pydantic` vs `spacy`)

   - `cv_tuner.py` enhanced with role buzz THREAD DATA 1 â€“ Pre-Timeline Summary Extract

This document includes all relevant project planning, backend setup, dev alignment, technical troubleshooting, and high-level strategy threads that occurred prior to the formal timeline milestone "Full IntelliCV Development Timeline (High Level)".

Key Activities Prior to Timeline Setup:

1. ğŸ“¦ Infrastructure & Environment
   - Virtual environments setup: venv / env310
   - Python version migrations: 3.13 â†’ 3.10 due to SpaCy and NumPy compatibility
   - `requirements.txt` restructuring: multiple versions reconciled into `requirements_cleaned.txt`
   - Pip issues and dependency conflicts resolved (notably `pydantic` vs `spacy`)

2. ğŸ§  AI/NLP Modules
   - `cv_matcher.py` updated to `cv_matcher_advanced.py`
   - `cv_tuner.py` enhanced with role buzzword mapping and tuning feedback logic
   - Radar chart and spider logic decoupled for future user scoring overlays

3. ğŸ’» Frontend Streamlit Integration
   - Streamlit dashboard scaffolded
   - Resume `user_resume.txt` loader
   - Dynamic analysis triggering backend modules
   - Display of: Match Score, Radar Chart, Tuning Recs
   - Integrated into `frontend/dashboard_app.py`

4. ğŸ“„ Resume Ingestion & Testing
   - Tested on Andreas Kern CV (standalone, no job description)
   - Issue: mismatch in CV keywords and analysis logic resolved
   - Architecture built to fall back on CV-only mode when no job provided

5. ğŸ” Job Description Matching
   - Enhanced matching with cosine similarity using TF-IDF
   - If `job_description.txt` exists â†’ compare and return match % + overlap keywords
   - If absent â†’ note: "No job provided. CV only analyzed"

6. ğŸ”’ Security / Lint / GDPR
   - Security architecture scaffolded
   - Code linting tools: ruff, mypy, bandit, pre-commit integrated
   - Compliance hooks for future opt-in logging, GDPR data traceability, cloudflare protections

7. ğŸ“ File Structure Alignment
   - Reorganized filepaths:
     - Backend: `backend/app/`, `backend/core/`, `backend/services/`
     - Frontend: `frontend/dashboard_app.py`
     - Data: `data/user_resume.txt`, `data/job_description.txt`
     - Output: `output/match_analysis.json`, `output/tuned_cv_recommendations.json`, `output/role_fit_chart.png`

8. ğŸš§ Testing + Debugging
   - Real-time error handling added to backend scripts
   - Dependency resolution scripting via `install_validate.py`
   - Consistency enforced across `cv_matcher`, `cv_tuner`, and radar modules
   
9. ğŸ—ƒï¸ Project Documentation Prep
   - Planning to compile all phases (1â€“6.8) into a timeline-locked format
   - Phase 6.8 marked as complete before GitHub push prep

All this activity precedes the point where a formalized development roadmap (timeline format) was introduced and locked into the project canvas.
